history.proof: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. qauto depth: 4 l: on use: @plus_opp_l, scal_zero_r, scal_distr_l, @plus_reg_r unfold: ModuleSpace.AbelianGroup, scal, opp, AbelianGroup.sort, ModuleSpace.sort.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_distr_l (scal _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
Found no subterm matching "scal (mult ?M2585 ?M2586) ?M2587" in the current goal.

In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K H6 : forall (x : K) (u : V), scal (opp x) u = opp (scal x u) H5 : forall (x y : K) (u : V), scal x (scal y u) = scal (mult x y) u H0 : forall (x : K) (u v : V), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) x : K u : V H2 : forall x : K, opp x = mult (opp one) x H3 : forall x : K, opp x = mult (opp one) x Unable to unify "AbelianGroup.opp V (ModuleSpace.class K V) (ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) x u)" with "ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) x (AbelianGroup.opp V (ModuleSpace.class K V) u)".

original: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. rewrite scal_distr_l. rewrite <- scal_assoc. rewrite opp_mult_m1. rewrite scal_assoc. rewrite scal_opp_l. reflexivity.
